About Me

About Me

Welcome to my personal website.

My name is Pablo. I am a Senior PhD in Computer Vision and also a MS majoring in Computer Science. I am currently a research consultant.

  • Name: Dr. Pablo Guzman
  • Website: https://pablitinho.github.io/
  • Email: ....
  • City: Granada
  • Interests: Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Autonomous Driving
Education

Education

  • 2004

    Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science (UGR)

  • 2008

    Master of Engineering in Computer Science. (UGR)

  • 2010

    Master of Engineering in Computer Architectures and Networks (UGR)

  • 2015

    PhD. Thesis Title: “Implementation of Models for Image Processing Applications with Real-Time Constraints”.

  • 2015 - Present

    Built several cool projects related to robots and deep learning.

  • 2019 - Present

    Pursuing M.S. in Computer Science at Georgia Tech.

  • May 2019 - Dec. 2019

    Application Engineer co-op at Segway

    Development on Robotics MobilityPlatform:
    1. NVIDIA Isaac Sim: Utilized Unity and Unreal Engine to build simulation for robot development. The robot achieved collision-free navigation in a warehouse environment around 60 square meter.
    2. Lidar Image Processing: Implemented PointPillar, a LIDAR encoding deep learning network using PyTorch for point cloud segementation.

Courses

    Ethernet, Profibus, AS-Interface and Profinet on Siemens S7 PLC.

    Advance PLC Siemens Development Course.

    Development in low language level (AWL) for Siemens S7 PLC to control gears, variable-frequency drive.

    University of Zaragoza, Spain.

    Texas Instruments, Stuttgart, Germany.
